< p > Secretary of State Mike Pompeo on Thursday said [ARG0: President Trump] [V: canceled] [ARG1: his planned summit with North Korea] [ARGM-CAU: in part because the United States did not receive replies from Pyongyang.</p] >
< p > Secretary of State Mike Pompeo on Thursday said President Trump canceled his planned summit with North Korea in part because the United States [V: did] not receive replies from Pyongyang.</p >

< p > Secretary of State Mike Pompeo on Thursday said President Trump canceled his planned summit with North Korea in part because [ARG0: the United States] did [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: receive] [ARG1: replies] [ARG2: from Pyongyang.</p] >
